file.name: openapi_before.yml
file.content:
# swagger-before.yml
openapi: "3.0.0"
info:
  description: "This is a publication management server."
  version: "2.0.0"
  title: "LibreCat Metadata Store API"
  contact:
    email: "librecat-dev@lists.uni-bielefeld.de"
  license:
    name: "Perl"
    url: "https://github.com/LibreCat/LibreCat/blob/master/LICENSE"
basePath: "api/v1"
schemes:
- "https"
security:
  - apiKey: []
components:
  errors:
    type: object
    properties:
      errors:
        type: array
        items:
          type: object
          properties:
            status:
              type: integer
            validation_error:
              type: string
  securitySchemes:
    apiKey:
      type: apiKey
      in: header
      name: Authorization
  responses:
    OK:
      description: Request has been processed successfully.
    Created:
      description: Resource has been successfully created.
    Deleted:
      description: Resource has been successfully deleted.
    BadRequest:
      description: Record is not valid.
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/errors"
    UnauthorizedError:
      description: Authentication information is missing or invalid
      headers:
        Authorization:
          schema:
            type: string
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/errors"
    NotFound:
      description: Requested resource does not exist.
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/errors"
